short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to open a new search tab and get CRAZY backgrounds of the most psychedelic colors and shapes possible.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Psychedelic Backgrounds on every new tab to ensure an extraordinary experience.

When your life needs a touch of color and fun… 

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Psychedelic Backgrounds Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab search to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. 

User Terms: https://jr-tech.online/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://jr-tech.online/privacy-policy/

**All images on the website and extension are royalty free
